channel.title: istio on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in istio on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: How to contribute to a new repository
item.description: How to contribute to a new repository Hello Dear readers. Today, I’m going to walk you through a process of contributing into a new repository. If you are new to Go development and would like to contribute somewhere but are at a loss in large repositories, this post will be for you. I selected the top repository in trending Go today. Which is istio. I think that’s sufficiently large and I have no idea about the repository, so I’m going to walk you through my process.
